name: Boise Prosthodontics
address: 1803 S Topaz Way Ste 120, Meridian, ID 83642
description: Boise Prosthodontics, led by Dr. Christopher Jones and Dr. Michael Gurney, specializes in complex restorative and implant dentistry, aiming to perfect smiles with advanced technology and compassionate care

name: Dr. Paul Romriell, DMD (Twin Falls Prosthodontics)
description: Dr. Paul Romriell is the only Maxillofacial Prosthodontist in Idaho, specializing in complex restorative treatments, dental implants, and prosthetics

name: Idaho Falls Dental Group
description: Idaho Falls Dental Group offers a comprehensive range of services including cosmetic dentistry, implant dentistry, dentures, and more, with a focus on patient comfort and advanced technology. Dr. Blake Barney is a prosthodontist at this practice

name: Lakeview Dental
address: 801 W Milwaukee Dr, Coeur d'Alene, ID 83815
description: Lakeview Dental provides expert prosthodontics and dental implants in Coeur d'Alene, focusing on restoring smiles with precision and care, offering personalized solutions for various dental needs

name: 208 Dental
description: Led by Dr. Eric Goettsche, 208 Dental in Meridian offers advanced prosthodontic services, combining expertise, technology, and compassionate care to restore and enhance smiles with custom dental prosthetics

name: Smile Now Boise Dentures & Implants
address: 10650 W. Fairview Ave, Suite 100, Boise, ID 83713
description: Dr. Ryan Sloan, a board-certified prosthodontist, leads Smile Now Boise Dentures & Implants, offering specialized oral rehabilitation, including dental implants, crowns, bridges, and dentures

name: Strobel Family Dental
description: Strobel Family Dental in Rexburg offers a range of dental services, with a focus on prosthodontics, aiming to help patients feel confident with their smiles

name: Affordable Dentures & Implants
description: This Nampa clinic provides affordable dentures and implants, along with tooth extractions and general dentistry services, aiming to restore confidence and improve oral health

name: Mark W. Wright DDS, PA
description: Dr. Mark W. Wright offers general dentistry, IV sedation, and denture services in Twin Falls, with a focus on personalized care and proven results for maintaining a healthy smile

name: Pocatello Family Dentistry Clinic
description: This clinic, part of the Idaho State University Advanced General Dentistry Program, offers comprehensive general dentistry services, including prosthodontics (crowns, bridges, and dentures)
